decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposed single storey rear extension, by way of it's position, size, scale and appearance, would have minimal impact on both the character of the dwelling and the local street scene and would not harm neighbours' living conditions and therefore complies with policies ENV-B.1.1 (New Development) and H.6.4 (Extensions and Alterations) of The London Borough of Hounslow UDP, Adopted December 2003; and the Council's Residential Extension Guidelines.
Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - No flank windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the northern or southern sidewall of the extension hereby approved without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 6 - The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area.
